solution_line_template: Purity will pay a third of Rose's share, which translates to {rose_share}/{purity_share_divisor} = <<{rose_share}/{purity_share_divisor}={purity_share}>>{purity_share} dollars.
Sheila has offered to pay {sheila_multiplier} * {purity_share} = <<{sheila_multiplier}*{purity_share}={sheila_share}>>{sheila_share} dollars
Combining everyone's share of the rent will give a total of {purity_share} + {sheila_share} + {rose_share} = <<{purity_share}+{sheila_share}+{rose_share}={total_rent}>>{total_rent} dollars
